explains: adj. 放大的；增大的；扩展的
v. 扩大，增大（enlarge 的过去分词）
wordGroup: enlarged scale 放大尺；放大比例尺

sentences.en: We're going to have this picture enlarged.
sentences.cn: 我们准备将这张照片放大。

sentences.en: During his administration, he immeasurably enlarged the power of the presidency.
sentences.cn: 在他执政期间，他无限地扩大了总统的权力。

sentences.en: Large quantities of water may also be stored in limestones when joints and cracks have been enlarged to form cavities.
sentences.cn: 当接缝和裂缝扩大形成空洞时，大量的水也会被储存在石灰岩中。
